facts.text: The sound of Darth Vader’s breathing was created using a scuba regulator.
Yoda was originally going to be played by a monkey in a mask.
Leonard Nimoy came up with the Vulcan nerve pinch himself.
The sound of the Enterprise doors was created using a toilet flushing in reverse.
Star Trek: The Motion Picture reused many props from the original series to save costs.
The phrase 'Beam me up, Scotty' was never actually said in the original series.
George Lucas partially funded Star Wars by using his salary from directing 'American Graffiti.'
Mark Hamill held his breath to film the trash compactor scene underwater.
Carrie Fisher’s buns hairstyle was inspired by Pancho Villa’s female fighters.
